import{post,get,upload}from"src/request/api";import{stringify}from"querystring";// 取消任务上传图
export var cancelTaskUpload=function cancelTaskUpload(data,params){return upload('/api/v1/app/timing/cancel-timing-task/upload-img',data,params);};// 查询我的限时任务详情
export var myTaskDetail=function myTaskDetail(data){return get('/api/v1/app/timing/my-task-detail',data);};// 限时任务取消完成
export var cancelAckTiming=function cancelAckTiming(data){var header={'Content-Type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded;charset=utf-8',taskId:data.taskId,cancelReason:data.cancelReason,remark:data.remark};return post('/api/v1/app/timing/cancel-timing-task/ack',stringify(data),header);};
